attributes.action: criminalize the mutilation of babies carried out by members of religous faiths
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If I as an individual were to mutilate a baby and claim that my god told me to do so my feet would not touch the ground.I would quite rightly be condemned.
Why then, does the law permit religous groups to do so?                      The practice is called "circumcision" and should have no place in a modern society.I call for this practice to be made unlawful
